QuestData.Title: An Explosive Opportunity
QuestData.Description:
You there!
Do I have the most AMAZING opportunity for you? A gnome named Wulferd Fizzbracket is on the eve of a breakthrough and could use an intrepid business partner that's on the brawnier side. Such as a $c like yourself.
Just follow the road east until you reach Fizzsprings Resort, the most fantastical wonder of nature. Wulferd is the type that stands out from the crowd.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Wulferd Fizzbracket at the Fizzsprings Resort.
QuestData.RewardText: A willing assistant? Well I can't turn you down now, can I?
